ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup plain yogurt with active cultures, at room temperature

cookingTips: Bring milk to 180°F, cool to 110°F, then add yogurt culture for proper fermentation
Keep the slow cooker on warm setting with towel wrapped around it to maintain temperature
Don't disturb the slow cooker for 8-10 hours to allow yogurt to set properly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why is it important to cool the milk before adding the yogurt culture?
